summary.span: 表示 32 位无符号整数。

span.span: Represents a 32-bit unsigned integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UInt32`值类型表示其值介于 0 到 4294967295 之间的无符号的整数。The `UInt32` value type represents unsigned integers with values ranging from 0 to 4,294,967,295. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类型不符合 CLS 規格。The type is not CLS-compliant. 符合 cls 的替代类型是。The CLS-compliant alternative type is . 可以改为使用来替换值，范围为从零到。 can be used instead to replace a value that ranges from zero to . 有关 CLS 遵从性的详细信息，请参阅[语言独立性和与语言无关的组件](~/docs/standard/language-independence-and-language-independent-components.md)。For more information about CLS compliance, see [Language Independence and Language-Independent Components](~/docs/standard/language-independence-and-language-independent-components.md). `UInt32` 提供方法来比较此类型的实例，请将转换到实例的值及其表示形式，并将转换为到此类型的实例的数字表示形式。`UInt32` provides methods to compare instances of this type, convert the value of an instance to its representation, and convert the representation of a number to an instance of this type. 了解如何设置规范代码控件的格式表示形式的值类型，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For information about how format specification codes control the representation of value types, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).

span.span: All members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 看起来要修改实例状态的成员实际上返回使用新值进行初始化的新实例。

span.span: Members that appear to modify instance state actually return a new instance initialized with the new value.

threadsafe.span: 作为使用任何其他类型，读取和写入对共享变量包含此类型的实例必须受到使用锁来确保线程安全性。

span.span: As with any other type, reading and writing to a shared variable that contains an instance of this type must be protected by a lock to guarantee thread safety.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现接口，并且执行略微优于方法因为它不具有要转换`value`参数的对象。This method implements the interface and performs slightly better than the method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object. 具体取决于您的编程语言，有可能对代码方法的参数类型包含的位数少于 （是更窄） 比实例类型。Depending on your programming language, it might be possible to code a method where the parameter type has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type. 这可能是因为某些编程语言执行表示具有任意数量的位的实例作为类型参数的隐式扩大转换。This is possible because some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that represents the parameter as a type with as many bits as the instance. 例如，假设实例类型是且参数类型为。For example, suppose the instance type is and the parameter type is . Microsoft C# 编译器将生成表示形式的参数值的说明对象，然后生成比较的值的方法实例和参数表示形式。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an object, then generates a method that compares the values of the instance and the parameter representation. 请查阅您的编程语言的文档以确定其编译器是否对数值类型执行隐式扩大转换。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型和非泛型版本的多个值和引用类型的方法。The following code example demonstrates generic and nongeneric versions of the method for several value and reference types. remarks.format: ## Remarks `s`参数应为以下形式的数字的字符串表示形式。The `s` parameter should be the string representation of a number in the following form. [*ws*][*sign*]*digits*[*ws*][*ws*][*sign*]*digits*[*ws*] 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表对每个元素进行了描述。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|可选的空白区域。Optional white space.| |*sign**sign*|一个可选符号后。An optional sign. 有效的符号字符由和当前区域性的属性。Valid sign characters are determined by the and properties of the current culture. 但是，可以仅使用零; 使用负号符号否则，该方法将引发。However, the negative sign symbol can be used only with zero; otherwise, the method throws an .| |*digits**digits*|范围从 0 到 9 的数字的序列。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9. 将忽略任何前导零。Any leading zeros are ignored.| > [!NOTE] > 指定的字符串`s`参数解释使用样式。The string specified by the `s` parameter is interpreted by using the style. 不能包含任何组分隔符或小数分隔符，而且不能包含小数部分。It cannot contain any group separators or decimal separator, and it cannot have a decimal portion. `s`通过使用中的格式设置信息分析参数对象，将初始化为当前系统区域性。The `s` parameter is parsed by using the formatting information in a object that is initialized for the current system culture. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 若要使用特定区域性的格式设置信息分析一个字符串，请使用方法。To parse a string by using the formatting information of a specific culture, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来分析字符串值的数组。The following example uses the method to parse an array of string values. remarks.format:
## Remarks `style`参数定义中允许的样式元素 （如空格、 正或负号符号、 组分隔符符号或十进制点符号）`s`分析操作成功的参数。The `style` parameter defines the style elements (such as white space, the positive or negative sign symbol, the group separator symbol, or the decimal point symbol) that are allowed in the `s` parameter for the parse operation to succeed. `style` 必须是中的位标志的组合枚举。`style` must be a combination of bit flags from the enumeration. `style`参数将使得此方法重载非常有用`s`包含十六进制值的字符串表示形式时数系 （十进制或十六进制） 由`s`仅在运行时，已知时，或者当你想要禁止的空白区域或正负符号`s`。The `style` parameter makes this method overload useful when `s` contains the string representation of a hexadecimal value, when the number system (decimal or hexadecimal) represented by `s` is known only at run time, or when you want to disallow white space or a sign symbol in `s`. 具体取决于值`style`，则`s`参数可能包含以下元素：Depending on the value of `style`, the `s` parameter may include the following elements: [*ws*][*$*][*sign*][*digits*,]*digits*[.*fractional_digits*][E[*sign*]*exponential_digits*][*ws*][*ws*][*$*][*sign*][*digits*,]*digits*[.*fractional_digits*][E[*sign*]*exponential_digits*][*ws*] 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 如果`style`包括，则`s`参数可能包含下列元素：If `style` includes , the `s` parameter may contain the following elements: [*ws*]*hexdigits*[*ws*][*ws*]*hexdigits*[*ws*] 下表对每个元素进行了描述。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|可选的空白区域。Optional white space. 空白可以出现在开头`s`如果`style`包括标志，它可以出现在末尾`s`如果`style`包括标志。White space can appear at the start of `s` if `style` includes the flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*$*|特定于区域性的货币符号。A culture-specific currency symbol. 在字符串中的位置由和当前区域性的属性。Its position in the string is defined by the and properties of the current culture. 当前区域性的货币符号可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括标志。The current culture's currency symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*sign**sign*|一个可选符号后。An optional sign. 符号可以显示在开头`s`如果`style`包括标志，它可以出现在末尾`s`如果`style`包括标志。The sign can appear at the start of `s` if `style` includes the flag, and it can appear at the end of `s` if `style` includes the flag. 可以在使用括号`s`指示负值`style`包括标志。Parentheses can be used in `s` to indicate a negative value if `style` includes the flag. 但是，可以仅使用零; 使用负号符号否则，该方法将引发。However, the negative sign symbol can be used only with zero; otherwise, the method throws an .| |*digits**digits*

*fractional_digits**fractional_digits*

(如果存在，负号，则`s`必须代表的值为零或该方法将引发。)若要显式定义的样式元素以及可出现在特定于区域性的格式设置信息`s`，使用方法。(If the negative sign is present, `s` must represent a value of zero, or the method throws an .) To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the method. `provider`参数是实现其方法将返回对象，它提供特定于区域性的格式信息`s`。The `provider` parameter is an implementation whose method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of `s`. 有三种方法使用`provider`参数来提供到分析操作的自定义格式设置信息：There are three ways to use the `provider` parameter to supply custom formatting information to the parse operation: - 您可以将传递的实际提供格式设置信息的对象。You can pass the actual object that provides formatting information. (其实现只需返回其自身。)(Its implementation of simply returns itself.) - 可以将传递对象，它指定的格式设置时要使用的区域性。You can pass a object that specifies the culture whose formatting is to be used. 其属性提供格式设置信息。Its property provides formatting information. - 可以传递自定义实现。You can pass a custom implementation. 其方法必须实例化并返回提供格式设置信息的对象。Its method must instantiate and return the object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`是`null`，则使用当前区域性。If `provider` is `null`, the for the current culture is used. ## Examples 下面的示例是按钮单击事件处理程序的 Web 窗体。The following example is the button click event handler of a Web form. 它使用返回的数组属性来确定用户的区域设置。It uses the array returned by the property to determine the user's locale. 它然后实例化对应于该区域设置的对象。It then instantiates a object that corresponds to that locale. 所属的对象的对象然后传递给方法将用户输入转换为值。The object that belongs to that object is then passed to the method to convert the user's input to a value. summary.span: 将此实例的数值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the numeric value of this instance to its equivalent string representation.

returns.span: 此实例的值的字符串表示形式，由一系列从 0 到 9 之间的数字组成，不包含符号或前导零。

span.span: The string representation of the value of this instance, consisting of a sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9, without a sign or leading zeroes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式默认值 （"G"或常规） 中的值使用的格式当前区域性的对象。The method formats a value in the default ("G", or general) format by using the object of the current culture. 如果你想要指定不同的格式或区域性，使用的其他重载方法，按如下所示：If you want to specify a different format or culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|特定区域性A specific culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| ## Examples 下面的示例显示使用默认值方法。The following example displays a value by using the default method. 它还显示的字符串表示形式使用一些标准格式说明符而得出的值。It also displays the string representations of the value that results from using some standard format specifiers. 这些示例使用 EN-US 区域性的格式设置约定来显示。The examples are displayed using the formatting conventions of the en-US culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式默认值 （"G"或常规） 中的值使用的格式指定区域性的对象。The method formats a value in the default ("G", or general) format by using the object of a specified culture. 如果你想要指定不同的格式或当前区域性，使用的其他重载方法，按如下所示：If you want to specify a different format or the current culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| `provider`参数是实现。The `provider` parameter is an implementation. 其方法将返回提供特定于区域性的格式设置信息的对象。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific formatting information. 但是，没有一个属性的具有通用数值格式说明符 ("G") 格式时使用。However, none of the properties of the are used when formatting with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). ## Examples 下面的示例通过使用多个格式提供程序，其中包括一个用于固定区域性设置 16 位有符号的整数值。The following example formats a 16-bit signed integer value by using several format providers, including one for the invariant culture. 该示例的输出说明了返回带格式的字符串方法无论是相同的格式提供程序。The output from the example illustrates that the formatted string returned by the method is the same regardless of the format provider. span.span: The string representation of the value of this instance as specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式通过使用指定的格式值对象，表示当前区域性的约定。The method formats a value in a specified format by using a object that represents the conventions of the current culture. 如果想要使用默认值 （"G"或常规） 格式或指定不同的区域性，请使用的其他重载方法，按如下所示：If you want to use the default ("G", or general) format or specify a different culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|特定区域性A specific culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| `format`参数可以是任何有效[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)，或的任意组合[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。The `format` parameter can be any valid [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md), or any combination of [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). 如果`format`等同于是否`null`，当前的返回值对象的格式与常规格式说明符 ("G")。If `format` is equal to or is `null`, the return value of the current object is formatted with the general format specifier ("G"). 如果`format`为其他任何值，该方法将引发。If `format` is any other value, the method throws a . .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关对.NET Framework 中的格式设置支持的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about support for formatting in the .NET Framework, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 返回字符串的格式由为当前区域性的对象。The format of the returned string is determined by the object for the current culture. 具体取决于`format`参数，此对象可以控制在输出字符串中的小数点符号和符号等组分隔符符号。Depending on the `format` parameter, this object controls symbols such as the group separator and the decimal point symbol in the output string. 若要提供除当前区域性以外区域性的格式设置信息，请调用重载。To provide formatting information for cultures other than the current culture, call the overload. ## Examples 下面的示例通过使用每个标准格式字符串和一些自定义格式字符串显示 32 位无符号的整数值。The following example displays a 32-bit unsigned integer value by using each standard format string and some custom format strings. [!code-csharp[System.UInt32.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uint32.tostring/cs/tostring3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.UInt32.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uint32.tostring/vb/tostring3.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式通过使用指定的格式值指定区域性的对象。The method formats a value in a specified format by using the object of a specified culture. 如果你想要使用默认格式或区域性设置，使用的其他重载方法，按如下所示：If you want to use default format or culture settings, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|特定区域性A specific culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| `format`参数可以是任何有效[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)，或的任意组合[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。The `format` parameter can be any valid [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md), or any combination of [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). 如果`format`等同于是否`null`，当前的返回值对象的格式与常规格式说明符 ("G")。If `format` is equal to or is `null`, the return value of the current object is formatted with the general format specifier ("G"). 如果`format`为其他任何值，该方法将引发。If `format` is any other value, the method throws a . .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). `provider`参数是实现。The `provider` parameter is an implementation. 其方法将返回提供此方法返回的字符串的格式的区域性特定信息的对象。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the string returned by this method. 当调用方法时，它调用`provider`参数的方法并将其传递对象，表示类型。When the method is invoked, it calls the `provider` parameter's method and passes it a object that represents the type. 方法随后返回对象提供信息的格式设置当前值，例如组分隔符符号或小数点符号。The method then returns the object that provides information for formatting the current value, such as the group separator symbol or the decimal point symbol. 有三种方法使用`provider`参数来提供到格式设置信息方法：There are three ways to use the `provider` parameter to supply formatting information to the method: - 可以将传递对象，表示提供格式设置信息的区域性。You can pass a object that represents the culture that supplies formatting information. 其方法将返回提供该区域性的数字格式设置信息的对象。Its method returns the object that provides numeric formatting information for that culture. - 您可以将传递的实际提供数字格式设置信息的对象。You can pass the actual object that provides numeric formatting information. (其实现只返回其自身。)(Its implementation of just returns itself.) - 可以传递用于实现的自定义对象。You can pass a custom object that implements . 其方法实例化并返回提供格式设置信息的对象。Its method instantiates and returns the object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`是`null`，则返回的字符串的格式设置基于当前区域性的对象。If `provider` is `null`, the formatting of the returned string is based on the object of the current culture. ## Examples 下面的示例显示通过使用标准数字格式说明符和大量特定于 32 位无符号的整数值对象。The following example displays a 32-bit unsigned integer value by using the standard numeric format specifiers and a number of specific objects.
